page.title: 15A MONDAY IN OUR SCHOOL
page.content: THE FIRST THING WE DO WHEN WE COME INTO SCHOOL IS SAY OUR PRAYER .NEXT WE CHOOSE A BOOK FOR SILENT READING WHILE THE TEACHER COLLECTS OUR DINNER MONEY . IT COSTS Â£2.4O FOR ONE WEEK. THEN SOME OF US USE THE SPELLING LAB ,OTHERS DO THEIR WRITING , SOME PEOPLE DO STORIES OR TOPICS AND OTHER PEOPLE DO MATHS OR WORK IN THE SHOP. EVERYBODY HAS A LIST OF WORK TO COMPLETE DURING THE MORNING . THE THREE PEOPLE IN PRIMARY 5 HAVE BEEN DOING A LOT OF WORK ON THE COMPUTER FOR THE DOOMSDAY PROJECT . JUST BEFORE DINNER WE STOP FOR A STORY .12 PEOPLE TAKE SCHOOL DINNERS AND 3 PEOPLE BRING PACKED LUNCHES . AFTER DINNER THE MUSIC TEACHER COMES ON HER SCOOTER AND WE HAVE SINGING , INSTRUMENTS AND RECORDERS . THE INFANTS GO HOME EARLY BUT WE DO NOT GO UNTIL HALF_PAST THREE.
